identifier.description: A unique value that serves as a distinct reference for this metadata entry.
identifier.$comment: TODO: Add example identifier / decide on id syntax

creator.description: Person overseeing the creation of the data, i.e. the Session Leader for a MAST-U shot, Lead Investigator for HIVE, or the user running a simulation.

creationTime.description: Creation time for this metadata entry.

workflowType.description: Specifies the type of workflow being executed, with possible values indicating whether the workflow is related to a 'facility' or a 'simulation'. A workflowType of 'facility' at UKAEA would concern data from HIVE or MAST-U, whereas a 'simulation' would be the output of the many codes used at UKAEA.

isPublished.description: Indicates whether the data has been officially published and made publicly accessible. A value of 'true' means the data is published, while 'false' means it is not.

quality.description: Represents the assessed quality of the data, with possible values indicating whether the data is 'unchecked', of 'bad' quality, 'pass' level, or 'good' quality.

description.description: A textual summary or explanation that provides additional context or details about the data or its contents.

license.description: Specifies the legal terms under which the data can be used, shared, or distributed. This field typically contains the name or identifier of the applicable license.

updatedTime.description: Records the date and time when the data or its metadata was last modified, following the ISO 8601 date-time format.

updatedBy.description: Identifies the individual or system responsible for the most recent update to the data or its metadata, typically represented as a username or identifier.
